entry.title: Game: Super God Trooper Zeroigar (PCFX, 1997)
entry.content: I played through most of Super God Trooper Zeroigar, a shmup for the PC-FX, tonight. It was pretty rad, but got a little bland towards the end, which is why I stopped playing. I don't understand Japanese, so the long Anime cutscenes and conversations didn't have a big impact on me, but I appreciated their presence. The shmuping was good, but the controls are way too sensitive, which led to many stupid deaths.
